page.title: 07ACHALEVEN SCHOOL,CONNEL
page.content: There is one primary school in the village_Achaleven Primary School,built in 1866.The school catchment area extends from Achnacloich on the east side to Dunstaffnage House on the west. There are 33 children and two full_ time teachers.There are also visiting teachers of Art,Music and P.E.The school is well equipped with colour television,radios,cassette recorders, micro computer,various musical instruments etc.A new piano was bought in 1980 at a cost of Â£791. Education takes place both in the classroom and outwith it as children travel to various places of interest and go out on nature walks around the village. School meals(cost 58p)are brought from Dunbeg School daily.At end of Primary7 most pupils go to Oban High School.
